entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Otherwise sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
